edu.ucla.sspace.clustering

Class Merge

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.clustering.Merge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Merge
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A status object that represents the result of agglomeratively merging two clusters. This class provides the information on which clusters were merged, what the id of the remaining cluster is, and the similarity of the two clusters at the point at which they were merged.
    See Also:
    HierarchicalAgglomerativeClustering.buildDendogram(Matrix,edu.ucla.sspace.clustering.HierarchicalAgglomerativeClustering.ClusterLinkage,edu.ucla.sspace.common.Similarity.SimType), Serialized Form

      • mergedCluster

        public int mergedCluster()
        Returns the ID of the cluster that was merged into another cluster.

      • remainingCluster

        public int remainingCluster()
        Returns the ID of the clusters into which another cluster was merged, i.e. all the data points in the merged cluster would now have this ID.

      • similarity

        public double similarity()
        Returns the similarity of the two clusters at the time of their merging.
